title: Cheese Puffs (Gougeres)
ingredients: ['120g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '250ml full fat milk', '125g butter (cut into 1cm cubes)', '6 large eggs (at room temperature)', '50g grated Parmesan or Romano cheese', '100g grated Gruyere cheese', '30g prosciutto, diced (optional)', '2 tablespoons milk', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']
